snippet: The long-awaited trial of Jim Greer, 50, a flamboyant former chairman of the Florida Republican Party who is accused of diverting campaign money for personal use, promises to further shake up the party.
abstract: Long-awaited trial of Jim Greer, flamboyant former chairman of the Florida Republican Party who is accused of diverting campaign money for personal use, promises to further shake up the party; Greer claims his ouster was engineered by Republican conservatives who despised former Gov Charlie Crist and resented Greer's support of governor during his unsuccessful 2010 Senate run.
lead_paragraph: The long-awaited trial of Jim Greer, 50, a flamboyant former chairman of the Florida Republican Party who is accused of diverting campaign money for personal use, promises to further shake up the party.

headline.seo: Florida Republicans Brace for Greer Trial
headline.main: Florida Republicans Brace for a Fraud Trial, and an Airing of Old Grudges
headline.print_headline: Florida Republicans Brace for a Fraud Trial, and an Airing of Old Grudges
